metadata: EpixChain v0.5.3 Upgrade Proposal - Deterministic Emission Fix
title: EpixChain v0.5.3 Deterministic Emission Fix
summary: This upgrade fixes a consensus-breaking bug where floating point arithmetic (float64, math.Pow) was used in token emission calculations. Different CPU architectures can produce slightly different floating point results, causing validators to mint different token amounts and potentially breaking consensus.
